leaflet.politicalParty: Plaid Cymru - The Party of Wales

messages.title: The Change Wales Needs
messages.content: On 5th May 2016, vote for the Assembly Members you trust to deliver the change Wales needs.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Opposes health cuts and a commitment to reform the NHS to deliver a full cancer treatment system within Wales, a new medical school in the North, and scrapping the unfair council tax.
Supporting local businesses, addressing high business rates, boosting the number of well-paid jobs.
Proposing smaller class sizes, protecting school budgets.

issues.economy: Supporting local businesses and addressing high business rates to boost the number of well-paid jobs.
issues.education: Smaller class sizes and protection of school budgets are among the educational priorities.
issues.health: A promise to oppose health cuts and a commitment to reform the NHS to provide comprehensive cancer treatment in Wales, set up a new medical school in the North, and eliminate the unfair council tax.

politicalExperience.achievements: Achievements include leading campaigns to protect public services, significant investment in the electricity grid, and progress for the Morlais tidal energy project.
